title: Working with LLM APIs: Dev Shares Experience Building AI Bots
author: Loraine Lawson
description: Ania Kubów is host of Code with Ania Kubów on YouTube. She shares what developers need to know to get started building AI bots.
cntitle: 与 LLM API 合作：开发人员分享构建 AI 机器人的经验
cndescription: Ania Kubów 是 YouTube 上 Code with Ania Kubów 的主持人。她分享了开发者在开始构建 AI 机器人时需要了解的内容。
